Author: Addy607623
Description: Does your stones fly everywhere except on the heads of your opponents? Whether mangen or onager, the „[KoBHV] Knock Out Area Attack Cursor“ helps you to give your opponents a headache! This mod replaces the siege area or ground attack mouse cursor with the „[KoBHV] Knock Out Area Attack Cursor“, which makes aiming much easier. You like the Mod? Try out other [KoBHV]-mods! If you have any questions or suggestions do not hesitate to contact me. Discord: Addy#1350
Title: [KoBHV] Knock Out Area Attack Cursor
